messages.content: As a Florida girl I have no clue how you all have not died. I could never live there.
We don't know what would have happened if she'd said no, which is why most guys wouldn't ask.
> [NAME] That is going to get sooo confusing if he does join our division.
Did you maybe get Tag and Hide and Seek confused ?
Generally you are still a “teacher” but I’m not sure 100%. I know my instructional coach role is still “teacher” contract/pay.
My dumb ass thought it was meant to be a magic wand and he was reversing time and I was really confused.
What? I didn’t understand a thing of what you said.
Oh, I see what you did... Trying to confuse me.
Not sure if we can call him ginger anymore. That hairline went into a recession that'd put 2009 to shame.
Of course I remember a time when I didn't know what calories were. I was a child.
Yeah, even though I give it to him that it was confusing that they designed Crysis 1 for PCs that wouldn't come out for like 5 years.
I honestly don't understand why everyone thinks he needs a rework because he's not "fun to play" in the worst game mode.
I don't understand how her hair is 'too light' or how that effects the concealer.
Some aren't. Either way it's a mystery how they obrained so many M1s.
Watch Vegan Gains’ video on that, he had it when he was like 13, highly doubt he was juicing then
What kind of behaviour is considered unattractive? I'm pretty clueless when it comes to dating.
I didn’t understand because it’s not dark mode
She said she was ok moving out ... now she isn’t. I have no idea.
I think in 1.0 it's a lot harder to SDI out of Fox's dair, but I forget why
I don’t know what I’m to say I’ll say it anyway
I can't understand why Pepsi and Coke are the two most popular sodas. Or why fans think they're so different.
Am i missing something or is this an antijoke that doesn't belong here?
Op is likely young and clueless. There’s likely a reason they’re in retail.
Maybe she was attempting to be ironic? I dunno, man, people are just an enigma.
Well they got removed so I’m not sure if I want to see it anyway.
Wouldn’t doubt its for good reasons, just didn’t understand what the were.
These memes are either on a 9gag level or r/funny levels of comedy. And I can't tell which is worse.
i know there were talks about it, but its doubtful :(
Yeah super confused about that considering it was only [NAME] she had beef with lol
Maybe so , i just dont know about him, team has enough turmoil they just dont need any more distractions
Crippling? How so? It’s with Fox Sports right? I figured they probably had a good deal with them, but maybe not.
If a woman forces a man's penis into her vagina, that ABSOLUTELY IS a crime. Not sure what you're smoking.
